org.selman.java3d.book.myjava3d
Interface GeometryUpdater

All Known Implementing Classes:
NoOpGeometryUpdater, RotatingGeometryUpdater
public interface GeometryUpdater

Definition of the GeometryUpdater interface. GeometryUpdater instances can be used to modify the geometry of a model, change RenderingEngine parameters, or modify Graphics parameters during frame rendering.
